title: unknown geometric font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419011607im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SHARP_2_6011.jpg)

hello everyone. . . any chance of an Id on this font??

cheers. cian.
author: sullivan

comments.content: Isn't this some kind of a Futura Bold with a flipped V used for A? The G and C are a bit different, though.

The G and C look like (almost) Novel Gothic (A.k.a. [Nimrod](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419011607/http:/www.qbf.de/dceng.htm) in QBF version). Some letters do look like a heavy Futura, maybe with extra stroke. I also thought of Berthold Block.

I guess the point is that this seems like a mix of fonts, some with edited glyphs.

- Mike Yanega
